attributes.action: ensure greater attention to detail by those responsible for presenting the United Kingdom to the public at home and in the world at large
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In tonight's news bulletin (Monday, 2 February 2009) images of the meeting between PM Gordon Brown and the Chinese Premier, Wen Jiabao, showed the desktop Union Jack displayed upside-down beside the Chinese flag. Is this carelessness or ignorance on behalf of those staging the meeting?
